User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user within the Sipha application.

profilePicture.description: URL to the user's profile picture.

bio.description: A short biography of the user.

BookClub.title: BookClub
BookClub.description: Represents a book club within the Sipha application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the book club.

bookId.description: Reference to the Book being read. (Relationship: Book 1:N BookClub)

ownerId.description: Reference to the User who owns the BookClub. (Relationship: User 1:N BookClub)

memberIds.description: References to Users who are members. (Relationship: User N:N BookClub)

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the book club was created.

Book.title: Book
Book.description: Represents a book within the Sipha application.

coverImage.description: URL to the book's cover image.

Discussion.title: Discussion
Discussion.description: Represents a discussion within a book club, related to a specific chapter or theme.

bookClubId.description: Reference to the BookClub this discussion belongs to. (Relationship: BookClub 1:N Discussion)

chapterNumber.description: The chapter number this discussion pertains to.

theme.description: Theme of the discussion, if not chapter-specific.

startTime.description: Scheduled start time of the discussion.

endTime.description: Scheduled end time of the discussion.

userIds.description: References to Users participating in the discussion. (Relationship: User N:N Discussion)

UserNote.title: UserNote
UserNote.description: Represents a private note a user has taken for a specific book chapter.

userId.description: The ID of the user who wrote the note.

bookId.description: The ID of the book the note is for.

chapterId.description: The ID of the chapter the note is for.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the note was created.

definition.description: Stores user profile data. Only the user can read/write their own profile.
